Sentencas: This work assesses the potential of surplus electricity in reducing greenhouse gas (GHG) emissions in the building sector.
Titulo: Assessing the potential of surplus clean power in reducing GHG emissions in the building sector using game theory; a case study of Ontario, CanadaInspec keywordsOther keywords

Sentencas: The assessment is done by modelling the interaction of government and energy consumer using game theory.
Titulo: Assessing the potential of surplus clean power in reducing GHG emissions in the building sector using game theory; a case study of Ontario, CanadaInspec keywordsOther keywords

Sentencas: The government can provide discounted power to energy consumer by covering a fraction of the off-peak price to encourage the replacement of natural gas consumption with electricity.
Titulo: Assessing the potential of surplus clean power in reducing GHG emissions in the building sector using game theory; a case study of Ontario, CanadaInspec keywordsOther keywords

Sentencas: This replacement reduces GHG emissions from the building sector.
Titulo: Assessing the potential of surplus clean power in reducing GHG emissions in the building sector using game theory; a case study of Ontario, CanadaInspec keywordsOther keywords

Sentencas: Energy consumer adopts electricity-based technologies only if it leads to a lower heat and electricity supply cost.
Titulo: Assessing the potential of surplus clean power in reducing GHG emissions in the building sector using game theory; a case study of Ontario, CanadaInspec keywordsOther keywords

Sentencas: Cost-effectiveness of solid oxide fuel cell, air-source heat pump (ASHP), and battery and hydrogen storage are assessed as alternatives to natural gas combined heat and power (CHP) and boiler technologies.
Titulo: Assessing the potential of surplus clean power in reducing GHG emissions in the building sector using game theory; a case study of Ontario, CanadaInspec keywordsOther keywords

Sentencas: The modelling results show that ASHP is the only technology that can compete with natural gas CHP and boiler.
Titulo: Assessing the potential of surplus clean power in reducing GHG emissions in the building sector using game theory; a case study of Ontario, CanadaInspec keywordsOther keywords

Sentencas: ASHP is chosen by the energy consumer when discounts of 4.5 cents/kWh or more for off-peak electricity are available.
Titulo: Assessing the potential of surplus clean power in reducing GHG emissions in the building sector using game theory; a case study of Ontario, CanadaInspec keywordsOther keywords

Sentencas: The analysis also showed that CHP could be completely replaced by grid power at discount value of 4.5 cents/kWh and up.
Titulo: Assessing the potential of surplus clean power in reducing GHG emissions in the building sector using game theory; a case study of Ontario, CanadaInspec keywordsOther keywords

Sentencas: Natural gas boilers continue playing a role in building heating supply even under increased discount for off-peak electricity price.
Titulo: Assessing the potential of surplus clean power in reducing GHG emissions in the building sector using game theory; a case study of Ontario, CanadaInspec keywordsOther keywords
